name: Light Theif
description:
Get into the boots of a young flame spirit and explore the dungeons in search for gem fragments. What do the gems do? Play to find out.

This game is being submitted for Minigame jam of 72 hours. Though other art assets were allowed to be used, i made most of the art myself. the tileset was downloaded from itch freegame resources. All sound effects are from freesound.org

I have been learning game development for only a month now and its been really fun. Please share your feedback on how you feel about the game.
